text: Sahar Ghoreishi () is an Iranian actress born on 27 December 1987 Tehran, Iran. She gained her fame among Iranians from playing the character named "Yalda" in Delnavazan TV Show. She started her acting career by performing a role in a TV show called Laj-o-Laj Bazi directed by Sayyed Mahdi Borgheyi in 2009. == References == * ==Other websites== * Category:Living people Category:1987 births Category:Actors from Tehran
title: Sahar Ghoreishi
